newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Sept 16.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Sept 16.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- Far-right leader Jean-Marie Le Pen is quoted as telling youth leaders of his National Front party he expects a "revolution" to shake France's political structures.

-- Aerospatiale chairman Yves Michot intends to merge the missile and defence-space branches of the state-owned aeronautics group. New unit would have a 12.7 billion francs turnover, project is to be presented to board on Sept 23. Merger seeks to fend off possible interest of Matra on missile branch, the paper adds.
-- Credit National buys Banque Francaise du Commerce Exterieur (BFCE) for an estimated total of 3.57 billion francs.
